results.task_name: Create a workunit with full details
results.prompt_sent: I need to track some work on fixing our login page. Create a workunit named "Fix Login Page Bug" in project 25bab28ce4d2448c9b8ba606267de822. The problem is that users can't log in when they have special characters in their password. We'll know it's done when all character types are supported and there are regression tests. Make it high priority.
model_responses: I'll create a workunit for fixing the login page bug with the details you provided.

tool_calls.name: create_workunit

arguments.name: Fix Login Page Bug
arguments.problem_statement: Users can't log in when they have special characters in their password
arguments.success_criteria: All character types are supported and there are regression tests
arguments.description: Investigate and fix the issue where users cannot log in when their passwords contain special characters. This workunit will track the investigation, implementation, and testing of the fix.

results.task_name: Add three tasks to a workunit
results.prompt_sent:
Add these three tasks to workunit 253d517aaadc4c10828334cf237cd854:
1. "Reproduce the bug locally" - high priority
2. "Identify root cause" - high priority  
3. "Write fix and add regression tests" - normal priority

All should start as todo.
